data.actual_result: Mouse is unlocked from Window as if Overlay were to open. (Clicking anywhere goes back to game)
data.short_description: [Overlay] Not hitting the Reload overlay after the Overlay crashes, hitting the overlay still unlocks the mouse as if there was an overlay.
data.steps_to_repro: - Crash Overlay (Effective method check Bug 19502) - Leave the Reload overlay to timeout (roughly 5-10 seconds) - Try to open Overlay (I would HIGHLY recommend a FPS where it's noticeable when the mouse is exited, I used Rocket league in this example)
